title: Macbook Air M4
description: Meet the MacBook Air M4: ultra-thin design, powerful M4 chip, stunning Retina display, and all-day battery—built for speed, style, and portability.

title: Macbook Pro M4 Pro
description: Experience top-tier performance with the 2024 MacBook Pro M4 Pro—featuring a 12-core CPU, 16-core GPU, stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and long-lasting battery life. Ideal for creators, coders, and professionals.
